duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop category strategies and lead sourcing teams to achieve procurement goals.
Initiate and foster relationships with stakeholders and prioritize procurement activities.
Support the implementation of new suppliers and administer vendor documentation.
Work closely with other team members and critical stakeholders to achieve procurement objectives.
Plan, organize, and evaluate purchasing activities of the organization and execute procurement plans.
Negotiate, contract, and execute agreements to fulfill day-to-day business needs.
Prepare and administer bids, requests for quotes, proposals, and other vendor documentation.
Work extended hours and weekends as needed to meet deadlines and resolve procurement issues.
Perform other duties as required to support procurement activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, Finance, Operations, Supply Chain, Life Sciences, Engineering, or comparable disciplines. Master’s degree preferred. Industry certifications a plus.
